content:
A fully funded PhD position at the University of Birmingham is available under my supervision, with scholarship for one UK home student.

The position is in theoretical computer science and will be hosted by the Theory of Computation group at the University of Birmingham. The intended research directions include category theory, type theory, and related areas.

Prospective candidates are encouraged to contact me directly, asap and before Christmas. Please include a CV and a brief description of your research interests and motivation.

  • About me: https://sergey-goncharov.org/
  • About Birmingham Theory Group: https://www.birmingham.ac.uk/research/centres-institutes/research-in-computer-science/theory-of-computation
A message was moved here from #community: positions > Funded PhD positions in MSP Strathclyde, UK by Nathanael Arkor.
